-e ---

# 𒁃 ≈ 𒋰𒀀𒑊

𒁃 BAḪAR₂ bakar baker √bake:

𒁃 ≈ 𒂔 BAḪAR₂ 𐎔𐎃𐎗 pḫr potter 𒁇𒂔 baḫar₃ 𒌋𒂔 baḫar₄ "potter" po'er (British) 𐎃

𒁃𒃲𒁇𒂔 BAR.EDIN Barden բրուտ brutᵒⁿ Britten "chief potters"

𒁃 BAHAR₂ "baked (of bricks)" =
𒁃 ALURAₓ ≈ 𒀠𒄯𒊏;𒀠𒃡𒊏;𒀠𒇻𒊏;𒀠𒇽𒃡𒊏; al-ᵇur5-ra ; al-ᵇur3-ra ; al-lu-ra ; al-lu2-ur3-ra "baked"

𒂊 ≈ 𒋰𒀀 ≠ 𒋰𒀀𒑊 ≈ 𒁃

𒀠𒄯𒊏 al ur₅ra
𒀠𒃡𒊏 al ᵍur₃ra ጋገረ gagärä cuire cure gar
𒀠𒇻𒊏 al-lu-ra •aluvar > אָפָה afá
𒀠𒇻𒊏 ᵖal-lu-ra wypalać --

𒀠𒇽𒃡𒊏𒁃 al-lu2-ur3-ra #alurax "baked" ⇔ Rauch
